member.name: T:UnityEngine.LocalizationAsset
member.summary: An asset to represent a table of localized strings for one specific locale.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.LocalizationAsset.localeIsoCode
member.summary: ISO Code used to identify the locale. ex: en-uk, zh-hans, ja

member.name: P:UnityEngine.LocalizationAsset.isEditorAsset
member.summary: Is this asset used to localize UI components of the Unity Editor

member.name: M:UnityEngine.LocalizationAsset.SetLocalizedString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Set the localized string for the specified key

member.name: M:UnityEngine.LocalizationAsset.GetLocalizedString(System.String)
member.summary: Get the localized string for the specified key.
